name: Zombie Shooter (itch) (ZyphyrX)
description:
Abstract:

Zombie Shooter is a simple top-down shooter game. The game contain 10 simple stages to be cleared. You have to complete the objectives such as eliminate all zombies, flip all switches and escape without being killed by zombies. Feel free to drop down any comments to help me improve the game!

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Aim: Mouse
  • Shoot: Left Click
  • Interact: Space Bar

Tips:

  • Keep your distance before you shoot as you'll miss if you're too close
  • Zombies will not be following your path, so use it as your advantage
  • Keep moving around and avoid being trapped in the corner as it is the definite way to die

Disclamer:

All the art is created by myself and the sound effects are imported from RPG Maker MV. The game was made by Pixel Game Maker MV and I also own RPG Maker MV therefore it is okay to import files from RPG Maker MV to Pixel Game Maker MV.
